description.brief: Headers and message definitions for communication with the AscTec helicopters

package.description: This Package contains header files for communication with the HL controller on the AscTec AutoPilot and custom message, server, and action definitions
package.author: Markus Achtelik, Michael Achtelik, Stephan Weiss, Laurent Kneip

review.notes: This is unstable and under active development
